trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 이 자동화 피어와 연결 된 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 액셀러레이터 키 조합을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 바로 가기 키 조합을 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스 이름을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the text that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기능을 설명 하는 텍스트를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"> </xref> 과 관련 된 컨트롤 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The text that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name that describes the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 요소와 연결 된를 설명 하는 이름을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name that describes the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
